You will be off the grid as well as being part of a small community. There is a store 15 min ute walk (Post Office, Liquor Store, Groceries). Historic buildings, great fishing & hunting, hiking, snowmobiling in winter, gold panning & mining. Manson Creek is approx. a 4 hr drive North of Prince George on a year round maintained road system. (180 km from Mackenzie or Fort St. James). Manson Creek & Germansen Landing were part of the Golf Rush in the 1870's & 1930's. Water lease is $75 for 5 years.
